idea-plugin.name: REST API Client Code Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Generate REST API client code from OpenAPI/Swagger specifications for JetBrains Rider.

This plugin provides code generators for:

C# Generators

  • NSwag: Generates C# REST API clients using NSwag
  • Refitter: Generates C# Refit interfaces using Refitter
  • OpenAPI Generator: Generates C# REST API clients using OpenAPI Generator
  • Microsoft Kiota: Generates C# REST API clients using Microsoft Kiota
  • Swagger Codegen CLI: Generates C# REST API clients using Swagger Codegen CLI
  • AutoREST: Generates C# REST API clients using AutoREST

TypeScript Generators

  • Angular: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Angular
  • Aurelia: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Aurelia
  • Axios: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Axios
  • Fetch: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Fetch
  • Inversify: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Inversify
  • jQuery: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for jQuery
  • NestJS: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for NestJS
  • Node: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Node
  • Redux Query: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for Redux Query
  • RxJS: Generates TypeScript REST API clients for RxJS

Features

  • Right-click context menu integration for .json, .yaml, .yml, and .refitter files
  • Support for Refitter settings files
  • Configurable namespace and output directory
  • Automatic dependency validation
  • Integration with rapicgen .NET tool

Requirements

  • .NET SDK 6.0 or higher
  • Java Runtime Environment (for some generators)
  • NPM (for some generators)
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0

  • Initial release of REST API Client Code Generator for JetBrains Rider
  • Support for generating C# REST API clients using NSwag, Refitter, OpenAPI Generator, Microsoft Kiota, Swagger Codegen CLI, and AutoREST
  • Support for generating TypeScript REST API clients for Angular, Aurelia, Axios, Fetch, Inversify, jQuery, NestJS, Node, Redux Query, and RxJS
  • Support for Refitter settings files
  • Context menu integration for .json, .yaml, .yml, and .refitter files
  • Configurable namespace and output directory settings
